gui module¶

class gui.gui¶

Bases: object

browse_historic_box()¶

Open a file dialog to browse and select a path to historical election data.

browse_plan_box()¶

Open a file dialog to browse and select a redistricting plan path.

browse_shape_box()¶

Open a file dialog to browse and select a shapefile.

choose_geo()¶

Stores the selected census geography in user_geo list. Choices should be [‘County’, ‘County Subdivision’, ‘Place’, ‘Tract’, ‘Voting District’] but only ‘Voting District’ is functioning

choose_pop()¶

Store the selected population field in user_pop list.

get_pop_column()¶

Get the population column options from the selected shapefile and send to update the choose_pop combo box with them. Default value = ‘tot_pop’

launch_tests()¶

Call on_state_changed to append the user_options, close the window, and pass the lists Loop completes when dictionary of plans returns

on_state_changed()¶

Updates the user_input list based on the state of the checkboxes when launch button is pushed.

update_pop_combo()¶

Update the population combo box with the available options.
